statements: SELECT * FROM SecurityProtocols
SELECT protocol_name, protocol_description FROM SecurityProtocols
SELECT * FROM SecurityProtocols WHERE id = 1
SELECT protocol_name, stored_procedure_script FROM SecurityProtocols
SELECT protocol_description FROM SecurityProtocols ORDER BY protocol_name DESC

SELECT protocol_name, protocol_description FROM SecurityProtocols WHERE id = 3;
SELECT protocol_name, stored_procedure_script FROM SecurityProtocols WHERE id > 2;
SELECT * FROM SecurityProtocols WHERE protocol_name LIKE '%SSL%';
SELECT id, protocol_description FROM SecurityProtocols WHERE protocol_name = 'TLS';

SELECT user_id, username, role FROM blockchain_users ORDER BY username ASC;
